ai_techniques.name: Gitingest with Gemini Pro 2.5
ai_techniques.description: A technique to analyze an entire codebase by using gitingest to extract code and feeding it to Gemini Pro 2.5's large context window (2M+ tokens). The AI can then identify duplicate functions, suggest code to remove, and provide organizational improvements.

ai_techniques.name: Documentation-Enhanced Prompting
ai_techniques.description: Adding documentation URLs or references when prompting AI tools to ground the model with specific context, which improves the relevance and accuracy of responses.
ai_techniques.example: Implement this feature [feature name] using this documentation: [URL]
ai_techniques.use_case: More reliable code generation with specific constraints

ai_techniques.name: Repeated Instructions in System Prompts
ai_techniques.description: Repeating key instructions multiple times in the system prompt to increase the likelihood that the AI will follow those instructions, especially for tool use.
ai_techniques.use_case: Improving AI adherence to specific behaviors

ai_techniques.name: Guided Debugging
ai_techniques.description: A technique where you explicitly tell the AI not to solve debugging problems directly, but instead to provide hints and guide you through the debugging process.
ai_techniques.example: Don't solve it for me, but I think here is the problem. Let's check that. Give me hints to think like a debugger.
ai_techniques.use_case: Learning debugging skills while using AI assistance

ai_techniques.name: V0 for Front End Development
ai_techniques.description: Using v0 (a tool from Vercel) to rapidly build frontend interfaces

ai_techniques.name: Mermaid.js Integration
ai_techniques.description: Using Mermaid.js for creating diagrams and visualizations from text-based definitions
ai_techniques.use_case: Creating visualizations and diagrams for projects

ai_techniques.name: Multi-API Integration with AI
ai_techniques.description: Combining multiple APIs (web search, Yelp API, Bing API) with AI agents using AI SDK to create a comprehensive search and processing pipeline
ai_techniques.use_case: Building sophisticated search tools with multiple data sources

ai_techniques.name: Vibe Coding
ai_techniques.description: A coding approach where developers rely heavily on AI tools to generate code for languages or frameworks they're not familiar with, 'vibing' with the AI to achieve results
ai_techniques.use_case: Rapid prototyping and learning new technologies

ai_techniques.name: NotebookLM for Mind Maps
ai_techniques.description: Using NotebookLM to generate mind maps for organizing ideas and concepts

ai_techniques.name: Gemma 3 Model Access
ai_techniques.description: Using Google AI Studio to access Gemma 3 27B models without need for local deployment
ai_techniques.use_case: Advanced language model capabilities without local hardware requirements

challenges_discussed.description: Managing growing codebases with many files and features
solutions_proposed: Using gitingest with Gemini Pro 2.5 for analysis

challenges_discussed.description: Difficulty debugging code in languages participants weren't familiar with
solutions_proposed: Guided debugging with LLMs rather than direct solutions
Learning debugging techniques with AI assistance
Taking breaks and stepping away from the keyboard

challenges_discussed.description: AI tools not consistently following instructions or behaving as expected
solutions_proposed: Using documentation to ground AI responses
Being more specific in requests to the AI

challenges_discussed.description: Balancing rapid development using AI with actually learning the underlying technologies
solutions_proposed: Using AI as a guide rather than a solution provider
Planning to revisit basics after completing projects
Asking the AI to explain its code
